idosal/git-mcp

turns any GitHub repo into a context server for AI tools

Related repos

  • GitHub MCP Server, a server for automating and interacting with GitHub APIs using the Model Context Protocol
  • central hub for managing AI tools, prompts, and resources with Model Context Protocol
  • lets AI tools manage WordPress sites with a plugin
  • Curated list of MCP servers for connecting AI models to tools and data sources
  • GitHub Chat MCP, tool for analyzing and querying GitHub repositories using an API
  • Model Context Protocol (MCP) server that connects AI apps to AWS data and tools for cloud development and automation
  • advanced Model Context Protocol tools for connecting AI to files, databases, GitHub, and web resources
  • Context Engineering project template for building AI coding assistants with full context, docs, and automation setup
  • MCP server for fast, token-efficient AI access to API and code docs
  • Allows AI models to interact with a Dokploy server
